title: JCO and I - people ignore the "obvious truth"

content.prompt: It can be inferred from the passage that people ignore the "obvious truth" (Paragraph 3) for which of the following reasons?

choices.label: They are too intimidated to disagree with famous writers like the author.
They do not want other people to tell them how they should view art.
They conclude too quickly that there is a difference between good and bad art.
They misunderstand the relationship between an artistic creation and its creator.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
